explains: v. 授予……终身职位（tenure 的过去分词）
wordGroup: tenure track 可授予终生职位的聘雇制度
life tenure 终身任期；终生职
security of tenure 职位/地位的稳定性；[经]使用期保障

sentences.en: If you're a tenured professor, it might not change.
sentences.cn: 如果你是终身教授，你的收入可能不变。

sentences.en: Universities are replacing tenure-track professors with non-tenured staff.
sentences.cn: 大学也将终身职位的教授转变为非终身职员。

sentences.en: Hurtful fun isn't made of those less tenured than you in the organization.
sentences.cn: 恶意取乐并不会让你长期留在组织中。
